info.title: Information :information_source:
info.description: Hello ^^! I'm Validity and I'm a Discord(TM) bot designed for plural systems/teams/communities/etc, allowing you to register a system, members of this system, groups, etc.

fields.name: What are "plural systems"?
fields.value: According to [Pluralpedia](https://pluralpedia.org/w/Plurality), a system is the collection of people and entities, often called headmates or alters, that share a single physical plural body.

fields.name: What is this bot for?
fields.value: It serves the exact same use as [PluralKit](https://pluralkit.me), depending on a defined tag, called a proxy, a message will be replaced by a fake account, with the name and the avatar defined by the member.

fields.name: System creation subcommand :white_check_mark:
fields.value:
`/system create [name] <desc> <color> <avatar>`
Creates your system (the arguments between <> are optionals)

fields.name: System deletion subcommand :x:
fields.value:
`/system delete`
Deletes your system. :warning: That cannot be undone :warning:
